info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:47PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Brown County through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stratford to Warner. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Aberdeen and Bath around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Richmond Lake Rec Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
